amendment.description: To require a report on responses to Indian student suicides.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2155 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2155 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 2089.
